Real-time Face Mask Detection

Loading...



Introduction

How to use it?

Launch Google chrome browser, open chrome://flags in the address bar and enable all WebAssembly features, then re-launch chrome and allow the access to camera.
iOS is not supported yet. The FPS depends on your device CPU.

Privacy Statement

Don't worry. The face mask detection program runs completely in your browser, and no information will be saved or uploaded to the server. You can even disconnect the internet after the detection started.

Project Summary

This is a deep learning project. The model used is modified from Yolo-Fastest and trained based on the Pytorch framework. It runs in the browser through NCNN and WebAssembly .
All content has been open sourced on my Github and blog.




   

Zekun Wang | Vanderbilt University
